title: 1996 48’ Utility Refrigerated Semi Truck Trailer
item_description:
1996 48’ Utility Refrigerated Semi Truck Trailer

Trailer Details

  • Year: 1995
  • Make: Utility
  • Model: VS2R
  • VIN: 1UYVS2486TU819301
  • License: 1VU9188
    • Expiration Date: 10/31/2017
  • Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR): 65,000 Lbs

Dimensions

  • Overall Length: 576”
  • Overall Width: 102”
  • Overall Height: 160”
  • Deck Length: 575”
  • Deck Width: 101”
  • Side Height: 102”

Axles, Brakes, and Tires

  • Suspension: Leaf Spring
  • Number of Axles: 2
  • Brake Type: Air
  • Number of Wheels: 8
  • Tire Size: 285/75R24.5
  • Electric Plug Type: 7-Way Round
  • Hitch: 5th Wheel

Note: Application for Replacement Title, Transfer Form, and Due Diligent Effort for registered owner paperwork will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of registration, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
